sentence: Catherine Davis (R), a frequent candidate for office, takes 5 percent of the vote; Kandiss Taylor (R), a teacher who ran for a U.S. Senate seat in 2020, would claim 2 percent.
title: Kemp, Raffensperger lead Trump-backed challengers in Georgia: poll

sentence: Catherine Davis (R), a frequent candidate for office, takes 5 percent of the vote; Kandiss Taylor (R), a teacher who ran for a U.S. Senate seat in 2020, would claim 2 percent.
title: Kemp, Raffensperger lead Trump-backed challengers in Georgia: poll

sentence: Besides Kemp and Perdue, the primary includes Republicans Catherine Davis, Kandiss Taylor and Tom Williams, who were excluded from Sunday's debate.
author: JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Georgia's Kemp and Perdue clash over elections in debate
